sections: A generous donation to a fitting charity could get you behind the wheel of one of the most capable Corvettes ever made and now Motorious readers can double their entries with the promo code WIN.
, using promo code 'WIN', this Arctic White
convertible features many Carbon Flash accents that will have you in awe of the style. However, what created that style was

pursuit of supercar equivalent power. Moving the 495-horsepower 6.2-liter V8 engine to behind the driver’s seat allowed for a remarkably aerodynamic design and an 8-speed automatic transmission offered performance to match.
For double the entries with the promo code
When fitted with the 3LT Equipment Group and the Z51 Performance Package

moves from supercar level to dream car status. Inside the cockpit you’ll find GT2 bucket seats and a black interior more akin to a luxury car rather than a sports car. Coming standard with the Z51 packages are an electronic limited-slip differential, a performance ratio rear axle, and Brembo anti-lock brakes that take the new Corvette’s performance capabilities to an all new level. Meanwhile a Carbon Flash painted nacelles and Carbon Flash painted 5-open-spoke aluminum wheels, a rear spoiler, and a hard top that can be operated at speeds of up to 30-mph add even more style and performance.
All you have to do to be entered to win this

is make a generous donation to Ronald McDonald House Central Valley. Donations between $5.00 and $500.00 will be accepted and all proceeds from the raffle will go to benefit sick children and their families. This is an awesome opportunity to lend a helping hand to your fellow American while also possibly adding to your garage. In addition, we are giving you the opportunity to double your entries with the promo
just for being a Motorious reader.
